info.title: NetBird REST API
info.description: API to manipulate groups, rules, policies and retrieve information about peers and users

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Interact with and view information about users.

tags.name: Tokens
tags.description: Interact with and view information about tokens.

tags.name: Peers
tags.description: Interact with and view information about peers.

tags.name: Policies
tags.description: Interact with and view information about policies.

tags.name: Routes
tags.description: Interact with and view information about routes.

tags.name: DNS
tags.description: Interact with and view information about DNS configuration.

tags.name: Events
tags.description: View information about the account and network events.

get.description: Returns a list of accounts of a user. Always returns a list of one account.

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of an account

get.description: Returns a list of all users

parameters.name: service_user
parameters.description: Filters users and returns either regular users or service users

post.description: Creates a new service user or sends an invite to a regular user

parameters.name: userId
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a user

get.description: Returns a list of all events

peer_login_expiration_enabled.description: Enables or disables peer login expiration globally. After peer's login has expired the user has to log in (authenticate). Applies only to peers that were added by a user (interactive SSO login).

peer_login_expiration.description: Period of time after which peer login expires (seconds).

auto_groups.description: Groups to auto-assign to peers registered by this user

is_current.description: Is true if authenticated user is the same as this user

is_service_user.description: Is true if this user is a service user

auto_groups.description: Groups to auto-assign to peers registered by this user

email.description: User's Email to send invite to

auto_groups.description: Groups to auto-assign to peers registered by this user

is_service_user.description: Is true if this user is a service user

last_seen.description: Last time peer connected to Netbird's management service

groups.description: Groups that the peer belongs to

ssh_enabled.description: Indicates whether SSH server is enabled on this peer

user_id.description: User ID of the user that enrolled this peer

dns_label.description: Peer's DNS label is the parsed peer name for domain resolution. It is used to form an FQDN by appending the account's domain to the peer label. e.g. peer-dns-label.netbird.cloud

login_expiration_enabled.description: Indicates whether peer login expiration has been enabled or not

login_expired.description: Indicates whether peer's login expired or not

last_login.description: Last time this peer performed log in (authentication). E.g., user authenticated.

type.description: Setup key type, one-off for single time usage and reusable

auto_groups.description: Setup key groups to auto-assign to peers registered with this key

usage_limit.description: A number of times this key can be used. The value of 0 indicates the unlimited usage.

type.description: Setup key type, one-off for single time usage and reusable

auto_groups.description: Setup key groups to auto-assign to peers registered with this key

usage_limit.description: A number of times this key can be used. The value of 0 indicates the unlimited usage.

created_by.description: User ID of the user who created the token

last_used.description: Date the token was last used

plain_token.description: Plain text representation of the generated token

peers_count.description: Count of peers associated to the group

description.example: This is a default rule that allows connections between all the resources

flow.description: Rule flow, currently, only "bidirect" for bi-directional traffic is accepted

description.example: This is a default rule that allows connections between all the resources
This is a default policy that allows connections between all the resources

rules.description: Policy rule object for policy UI editor

network_id.description: Route network identifier, to group HA routes

metric.description: Route metric number. Lowest number has higher priority

masquerade.description: Indicate if peer should masquerade traffic to this route's prefix

network_type.description: Network type indicating if it is IPv4 or IPv6

disabled_management_groups.description: Groups whose DNS management is disabled

timestamp.description: The date and time when the event occurred

activity.description: The activity that occurred during the event

activity_code.description: The string code of the activity that occurred during the event

initiator_id.description: The ID of the initiator of the event. E.g., an ID of a user that triggered the event.

target_id.description: The ID of the target of the event. E.g., an ID of the peer that a user removed.

TokenAuth.description: Enter the token with the `Token` prefix, e.g. "Token nbp_F3f0d.....".
TokenAuth.name: Authorization
